title: King Conga

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, add a player to the conga line. At the beginning of the following night, that player will be notified that they are now dancing in a conga line.
- Attack a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each player in the conga line will be forced to visit whichever player was previously added to the conga line before they were.
- If a player in the conga line dies, every player who had been added to the line after that player will be removed from the conga line.
- You are the first player in the conga line.
- If the only players remaining at any point in the game are you and the other players in the conga line, the game ends in the victory of you and everyone who is a part of the conga line.
- If you are attacked, the attack will hit the last player who was added to the conga line.
- You will have a list of every player who is in the conga line pinned in your channel.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you and your line of conga dancers.

desc:
Post 1594
*Stay on beat, or he'll beat you to death.*
